type.description:
## In Rain

---



[Entity Condition Type](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/entity_condition_types/in_rain)

Checks if it's raining at the entity's position.

Type ID: `origins:in_rain`




---

### Examples

```json
"condition": {
    "type": "origins:in_rain"
}
```
